turns.utterance: I love going hiking! It's so nice to hike through the countryside and on trails.
turns.response: I also enjoy hiking.  It is great exercise and also a really fun way to enjoy nature

turns.utterance: Hiking is a popular activity. All forms of walking have health benefits, and hiking has even better benefits!
turns.response: I really enjoy hiking in National Parks.  I also enjoy hiking around rivers and lakes

turns.utterance: That's awesome! My boyfriend and I go on day hikes, they normally take up the entire day!
turns.response: I enjoy backpacking as well.  It is a little bit different than regular hiking in that it generally lasts longer than a day

turns.utterance: Sometimes we enjoy going off trail just to switch up the monotony of following the pathways.
turns.response: You just have to watch out for going off trail.  There are a lot of hazards involved in hiking

phrase: i am too old to hike i am in my seventies.
